body_html:
I'm very interested in this getting merged. @martinwicke why are the benchmarks in https://github.com/MycChiu/fast-LayerNorm-TF not sufficient?

If not, where are the "convolution or matmul" benchmarks you are talking about? I would like to help.

body:
I'm very interested in this getting merged. @martinwicke why are the benchmarks in https://github.com/MycChiu/fast-LayerNorm-TF not sufficient?

If not, where are the "convolution or matmul" benchmarks you are talking about? I would like to help.
